briefTitle: The Use of a High-frequency Ultrasonic Knife in Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Randomized Controlled Study of Benefits of Ultrasonic Knife in Breast Cancer Surgery
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Operable breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inoperable breast cancer
* BMI \> 25
* Neoadiuvant radioterapy
* Carcinomastitis
* Previous phlebitis of omolateral arm
* Collagen disease
